attributes.action: No more benefits for those who preach hatred towards the British public and deport those who are not British Citizens
attributes.additional_details:
I want a zero tolerence policy on those who preach hatred or violence to British Citizens whilst in the UK. They should have their benefits stopped and deported if they are not a British Citizen.
The British tax payers should not pay to sustain people who do not agree with British values and will try to disrupt them.
